title: Flattened Sensor Data Schema
description: Schema for flattened UltraHuman sensor data using flatten_json_to_columns utility

object_day_start_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp for the start of the day

object_title.description: Human readable title for the sensor data

object_values_value.description: Measured value from flattened values array

object_values_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when measurement was taken from flattened values array

object_sleep_graph_data_start.description: Start timestamp for sleep stage from flattened sleep_graph.data array

object_sleep_graph_data_end.description: End timestamp for sleep stage from flattened sleep_graph.data array

object_sleep_graph_data_type.description: Type of sleep stage from flattened sleep_graph.data array

object_hr_graph_data_timestamp.description: Timestamp for HR measurement from flattened hr_graph.data array

object_hr_graph_data_value.description: Heart rate value from flattened hr_graph.data array

object_hrv_graph_data_timestamp.description: Timestamp for HRV measurement from flattened hrv_graph.data array

object_hrv_graph_data_value.description: HRV value from flattened hrv_graph.data array

object_summary_title.description: Title of the summary metric from flattened summary array

object_summary_state.description: State of the metric from flattened summary array

object_summary_state_title.description: Human readable state description from flattened summary array

object_summary_score.description: Numeric score for the metric from flattened summary array

object_summary_education_modal_deeplink.description: Deep link to educational content from flattened summary array

object_day_start_timestamp_iso8601.description: Day start timestamp in ISO 8601 format

object_day_start_timestamp_iso8601_tz.description: Day start timestamp in ISO 8601 format with timezone

object_day_end_timestamp_iso8601.description: Day end timestamp in ISO 8601 format

object_day_end_timestamp_iso8601_tz.description: Day end timestamp in ISO 8601 format with timezone

object_values_timestamp_iso8601.description: Timestamp for measurement in ISO 8601 format

object_values_timestamp_iso8601_tz.description: Timestamp for measurement in ISO 8601 format with timezone
